# 1880 Chicago White Stockings season

| league_place = 1st
| owner = William Hulbert
| manager = Cap Anson
| television =
| radio =
|}}
The 1880 Chicago White Stockings season was the ninth season of the Chicago White Stockings franchise, the fifth in the National League and the third at Lakefront Park. The White Stockings won the National League championship with a record of 67â€“17.
